AboutSection.title: Why choose Ejada?
AboutSection.text: At Ejadah Law Firm and Legal Consultations, we provide comprehensive legal solutions for individuals and companies, led by a select group of specialized lawyers and consultants to ensure the best outcomes in accordance with Saudi regulations. We are committed to providing legal services based on a thorough understanding of our clients' needs, while offering practical solutions that help them make sound legal decisions with confidence and security. We are also committed to building long-term partnerships with our clients by providing ongoing legal support that contributes to protecting their interests and enhancing the stability of their businesses in a changing legal environment

ServicesSection.title: We offer comprehensive legal and consulting services that meet the needs of individuals and organizations in accordance with approved regulations

itemsService.title: Services for companies and commercial establishments
itemsService.text: This service covers company formation, preparation of internal regulations, official registration, coordination with authorities, and ongoing legal advice to ensure compliance with Saudi regulations and protect stakeholders interests

itemsService.title: Money market systems
itemsService.text: We provide expert advice and follow-up on all capital market procedures, including the issuance of stocks and bonds, regulated trading, compliance with the Capital Market Authority's regulations, and protecting investors from legal risks, to ensure a transparent and fair financial market

itemsService.title: Governance and Public Policies
itemsService.text: This service includes developing governance policies, defining the powers and responsibilities of managers and employees, establishing an internal control system, and ensuring the organization's compliance with national and international laws and regulations, which enhances transparency and accountability.

itemsService.title: Drafting contracts and agreements
itemsService.text: This includes drafting all types of commercial and personal contracts and agreements, reviewing and legally auditing them, and ensuring clarity of obligations and rights, which reduces legal risks and facilitates the settlement of any future disputes

itemsService.title: Arbitration and Mediation
itemsService.text: We offer arbitration and mediation services to resolve commercial and civil disputes, saving time and costs, while ensuring fair and binding solutions for both parties in accordance with the regulations adopted in the Kingdom

itemsService.title: Division and settlement of estates
itemsService.text: This includes inventorying the estate's assets and liabilities, preparing a liquidation and distribution plan in accordance with Sharia and legal regulations, ensuring the protection of the heirs' rights and minimizing potential disputes between the parties

itemsService.title: Endowments and Wills
itemsService.text: We provide legal advice for drafting endowments and wills, ensuring their proper implementation, organizing their management and investment, and protecting the rights of beneficiaries in accordance with Saudi regulations and Sharia controls

itemsService.title: Legal Consultations
itemsService.text: This service includes providing expert legal opinions, risk assessment, clarifying rights and obligations, and supporting clients in making the right decisions to ensure their interests are protected in accordance with applicable laws

itemsService.title: Zakat and tax consultations
itemsService.text: We offer professional solutions for tax and zakat planning, reporting, ensuring compliance with financial regulations, and avoiding violations, thus achieving legal and financial security for clients

itemsService.title: Litigation and Dispute Resolution
itemsService.text: Providing litigation services before courts and judicial bodies, drafting lawsuits and objections, negotiating amicable settlements, and ensuring the protection of legal rights in the best legal ways

itemsService.title: Regulations and Legislation
itemsService.text: We provide services for drafting internal regulations and policies to ensure the organization of work, compliance with local and international laws, and protection of the establishment from legal risks

itemsService.title: Documentation and registration of real estate
itemsService.text: The service includes documenting contracts and transactions, registering ownership and real rights, and the regulatory procedures to ensure legal protection and avoid future disputes

itemsService.title: intellectual property
itemsService.text: We offer patent, copyright, and trademark registration services, as well as legal advice to ensure that innovations are protected and commercially utilized, preventing any unlawful use

itemsService.title: Foreign investment
itemsService.text: This service includes providing legal advice on foreign investment, registering foreign companies, complying with investment regulations, and protecting investors' rights from any legal or regulatory complications

itemsService.title: Work Regulations
itemsService.text: This includes drafting employment contracts, preparing internal regulations, providing advice on the legal obligations of employees and employers, and ensuring a regulated and safe work environment

itemsService.title: Implementation Services
itemsService.text: We provide legal claims follow-up services, filing enforcement lawsuits, dealing with judicial authorities to ensure the collection of rights, and settling enforcement-related disputes in the best legal ways

itemsQuestions.Question: What legal services does Ejadah offer?
itemsQuestions.Answer: We offer comprehensive legal services including legal advice, drafting and reviewing contracts, company formation, litigation before judicial authorities, arbitration and mediation, governance, zakat and tax advice, and services for individuals and companies. Visit our services for more information

itemsQuestions.Question: How can I request legal advice?
itemsQuestions.Answer: You can request a consultation via the website form or contact us directly by phone or WhatsApp to schedule a suitable appointment.

itemsQuestions.Question: Do you offer your services to individuals and companies?
itemsQuestions.Answer: Yes, we offer our legal services to individuals, entrepreneurs, small and medium-sized enterprises, as well as large corporations

itemsQuestions.Question: Is it possible to get legal advice remotely?
itemsQuestions.Answer: Yes, we provide remote legal advice via telephone or video meetings to facilitate access to our services

itemsQuestions.Question: How long does it take to process a legal case or request?
itemsQuestions.Answer: The duration varies depending on the type and complexity of the case, and the client is provided with an initial time estimate after studying the case

itemsQuestions.Question: Is the information kept confidential?
itemsQuestions.Answer: All information and documents submitted are subject to strict confidentiality in accordance with professional ethics and applicable regulations

itemsQuestions.Question: How are legal service fees determined?
itemsQuestions.Answer: The fees are determined based on the type of service and the amount of work required, and are clearly agreed upon with the client before work begins
